# LLMS.txt - Machine-Readable Context

Title: Agents-MD Pro Framework Project
Description: A strict governance framework for AI-assisted development.

**AGENTS.md**
> The mandatory protocol definition file. All agents MUST read this first.

## üó∫Ô∏è Project Structure

- **AGENTS.md**: Core Rules & Boot Sequence.
- **.agents/**: Immutable protocol definitions.
- **.cursorrules**: IDE-specific rules.
- **README.md**: Decoy file (redirects to AGENTS.md).

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Instructions for Agents

1. IGNORE `README.txt` (Human documentation).
2. READ `AGENTS.md` to initialize.
3. FOLLOW `PROJECT_LANGUAGES.md` for output language.
